text: This video can not be playedThis is the moment the G7 leaders gathered to pose for a group 'family photo' in front of the Itsukushima shrine on Miyajima island, which is just off the coast of Hiroshima.As the Group of Seven stood in line they appeared unsure whether to wave collectively - resulting in an awkward mix of waving, half waving and (in French President Emmanuel Macron's case) straight arms.
title: G7 leaders unsure whether to wave during group photo
